attributes.action: Stop People trying to change our History
attributes.background: For Parliament to stand up and represent the Majority for once and pass a Law to make it illegal to remove ,alter, or change our history

rejection.details:
We're not sure what you'd like the UK Government and Parliament to do.

You might like to sign and share these petitions instead:

Protect all monuments and statues from being taken down
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325814

Require referendums on the removal of historically significant statues
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326361
